summary: This is a cover email from UBS Financial Services Inc. transmitting financial records in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena dated August 16, 2019, related to the Epstein case. It confirms the scope of the request and details the documents being produced, including account opening documents, statements, checks, wires, and correspondence.

events.title: Phone call confirming subpoena scope
events.description: A phone call occurred between the sender and recipient to confirm the scope of the request for documents under the Grand Jury Subpoena.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued, compelling UBS Financial Services Inc. to produce financial records related to the Epstein matter.

events.title: UBS production transmitted
events.description: UBS transmitted a production of financial documents including account opening documents, statements, checks, wires, and correspondence in response to the subpoena.

keyFacts: UBS Financial Services Inc. was served with a Grand Jury Subpoena dated August 16, 2019, related to the Epstein investigation.
The production includes sensitive financial records: account opening documents, statements, copies of checks and wires, and correspondence.
The scope of the request was confirmed via a phone call on September 24, 2019.
The email correspondence portion of the production was still pending as of November 6, 2019.
The document demonstrates active financial investigation into Epstein's affairs by a grand jury in late 2019.
